attributes.action: consider a state, Funeral for Mr. HARRY PATCH
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned, do ask, that the Government consider a state, Funeral for Mr. HARRY PATCH the last surviving WWI Veteran, When this Gentleman, answers the last roll call, it will mark the passing of a poignant part of World History.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "consider a state, Funeral for Mr. HARRY PATCH"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17937


Prime Minister's Office
